slide_enter_angle.description: The angle at which we will enter the sliding character state.

slide_enter_minimum_duration.description: The minimum duration we need to stay in a slope considered too steep before we enter into a slide.

slide_speed.description: The speed at which we slide at.

slide_gravity_multiplier.description: A multiplier for the gravity which brings you to slide down slopes.

slide_minimum_duration.description: The minimum duration we stay in the sliding character state once we've entered it.

slide_exit_angle.description: The angle at which we will exit the sliding character state and be able to move again.

slide_beyond_mover_max_angle_exit_durati.description: While in a slide, this is the duration we have to be beyond the max mover slopes angle before we choose to exit the slide.

slowed_movement_start_angle_uphill.description: The angle at which we will start to move slower in uphill slopes.

slowed_movement_max_angle_uphill.description: The angle at which we will move as slowest in uphill slopes.

slowed_movement_speed_multiplier_uphill.description: The multiplier applied to movement speed when running uphill - scaled from 1 to slowed_movement_speed_multiplier_uphill.

slowed_movement_start_angle_downhill.description: The angle at which we will start to move slower in downhill slopes.

slowed_movement_max_angle_downhill.description: The angle at which we will move as slowest in downhill slopes.

slowed_movement_speed_multiplier_downhil.description: The multiplier applied to movement speed when running downhill - scaled from 1 to slowed_movement_speed_multiplier_downhill.

slope_angle_interpolation_fraction_per_s.description: The interpolation speed for the slope normal and angle used to calculate all of the slope modifiers.
